A Local news Paper politics,Sports,Economy, Art and Multimedia

Abu Dhabi Media is one of the fastest growing, multi-platform media and entertainment organizations in the Middle East, operating across the broadcast, publishing, and digital media sectors.

The company manages over 20 market-leading brands in two categories: brands that serve the UAE through a defined public service role; and brands that target the wider Arab world with clear commercial objectives. 


The company also has strong commercial aspirations, targeting women and families with brands that reach across the pan-Arab world.
data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Select Accept to consent or Reject to decline non-essential cookies for this use. You can update your choices at any time in your settings.

Alittihad News Paper From the United Arab Emirates A Local news Paper politics,Sports,Economy, Art and Multimedia Abu Dhabi Media is one of the fastest growing, multi-platform media and entertainment organizations in the Middle East, operating across the broadcast, publishing, and digital media sectors. The company manages over 20 market-leading brands in two categories: brands that serve the UAE through a defined public service role; and brands that target the wider Arab world with clear commercial objectives. The company also has strong commercial aspirations, targeting women and families with brands that reach across the pan-Arab world. These include Abu Dhabi Al Oula TV, leading womenâ€™s magazine Zahrat Al Khaleej, and online platform anaZahra.com, as well as a suite of pay TV brands and digital entities such as ADMCSport.com. Abu Dhabi Media owns and operates a number of subsidiaries, including: local film company, Image Nation Abu Dhabi; LIVE, the most advanced outdoor broadcast and production company; and state-of-the-art printing facility, United Printing Press (UPP). In addition, the company partners with Universal Music Group and Sony Music Entertainment on VEVO, the premium online music video platform; and with National Geographic on National Geographic Abu Dhabi, the Arabic language television channel, and National Geographic Al Arabiya magazine.

http://www.alittihad.ae
